arts.ttl: Nice drops to fifth in Ligue 1 after draw at Toulouse ahead of Marseille vs. Lyon
arts.sum: Later Sunday, new coach Paulo Fonseca took charge of his first game for Lyon away to second-place Marseille. Nice dropped to fifth place in the French league after conceding a late goal in a 1-1 draw at Toulouse on Sunday.

OGC Nice head into this game against Toulouse in a strong position, steadily regaining key players from injury. Franck Haise also had the luxury of rotating his squad midweek, resting his best players...

arts.ttl: Nice striker Evann Guessand on Aston Villa’s shortlist to replace Jhon Duran
arts.sum: A strong start to 2024-25 campaign for Evann Guessand (23) has caught the attention of Aston Villa. Unai Emery’s men are looking for a new striker, having recently sold Jhon…
